Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.service

Class TableServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.AbstractComponentService<TableComponentType,Table>
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.service.TableServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TableService
public class TableServiceImpl extends AbstractComponentService<TableComponentType,Table> implements TableService
Implementation of the TableService interface, providing concrete logic for interacting with table components.

This service is responsible for reading tables and rows, inserting values, filtering, sorting, and validating tables. It utilizes a registry to manage table-related services dynamically.

Author:

    • readTable

      @SafeVarargs public final <T> List<T> readTable(TableComponentType tableComponentType, int start, int end, Class<T> clazz, TableField<T>... fields)

      Specified by:
      readTable in interface TableService
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      tableComponentType - The type of table component being used.
      start - The starting row index (inclusive, 1-based index).
      end - The ending row index (exclusive, 1-based index).
      clazz - The class type representing the table rows.
      fields - The fields to be extracted from the table. If not provided, all fields are retrieved.

    • readRow

      public final <T> T readRow(TableComponentType tableComponentType, int row, Class<T> clazz)
      Reads a single row from the table based on the given row index.

      The method retrieves the data of the specified row and maps it to the provided class type.

      Specified by:
      readRow in interface TableService
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      tableComponentType - The type of table component being used.
      row - The index of the row to be read (1-based index).
      clazz - The class type representing the row structure.
      Returns:
      An object representing the row data.

    • readRow

      public final <T> T readRow(TableComponentType tableComponentType, List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> clazz)
      Reads a single row from the table based on specific search criteria.

      This method searches for a row matching the given criteria and maps it to the provided class type.

      Specified by:
      readRow in interface TableService
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      tableComponentType - The type of table component being used.
      searchCriteria - A list of string values used to locate the row.
      clazz - The class type representing the row structure.
      Returns:
      An object representing the matched row.
